attributes.action: Ban fireworks for the environment and those with PTSD.
attributes.additional_details: I speak for thousands when I say that it would be a big relief if fireworks were banned as it would make the country better with so many benefits.
attributes.background: To ban fireworks in the uk for the environment and those with PTSD, as it can effect animals and people who have horrible trauma in their pasts.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
